casebody.data:
Mary MELVIN, Complainant-Petitioner,
v.
NEW JERSEY DIVISION OF CHILD PROTECTION AND PERMANENCY, Respondent-Respondent. C-477 September Term 2018
080897 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 18, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000222-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
